me.aliceq.garbler.analyzer

Class LetterInfluenceAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.aliceq.garbler.analyzer.LetterInfluenceAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GarblerAnalyzer<java.lang.Character>

    public class LetterInfluenceAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
implements GarblerAnalyzer<java.lang.Character>
    Analyzer module which maintains information on each character's influence on future characters

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LetterInfluenceAnalyzer()
      Creates an analyzer of radius 3 and weight of sqrt(2)
      LetterInfluenceAnalyzer(float weight)
      Creates a letter influence analyzer of radius 3
      LetterInfluenceAnalyzer(int radius)
      Creates a letter influence analyzer of weight of sqrt(2)
      LetterInfluenceAnalyzer(int radius, float weight)
      Creates a letter influence analyzer

    • Constructor Detail

      • LetterInfluenceAnalyzer

        public LetterInfluenceAnalyzer()
        Creates an analyzer of radius 3 and weight of sqrt(2)

      • LetterInfluenceAnalyzer

        public LetterInfluenceAnalyzer(int radius)
        Creates a letter influence analyzer of weight of sqrt(2)
        Parameters:
        radius - the maximum distance a character can have influence. The higher the influence radius the more memory is used.

      • LetterInfluenceAnalyzer

        public LetterInfluenceAnalyzer(float weight)
        Creates a letter influence analyzer of radius 3
        Parameters:
        weight - the k_n value to apply to the power series calculation when retrieving data

      • LetterInfluenceAnalyzer

        public LetterInfluenceAnalyzer(int radius,
                               float weight)
        Creates a letter influence analyzer
        Parameters:
        radius - the maximum distance a character can have influence. The higher the influence radius the more memory is used.
        weight - the k_n value to apply to the power series calculation when retrieving data

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Description copied from interface: GarblerAnalyzer
        Clears all data within the analyzer. This should be equivalent to making a new instance with the same configuration.
